ComicInfo.Summary: Dale has been kidnapped by the mysterious hunters and the search to rescue him began. Later, the group decide to take shelter in Gabriel's church but Andrea discovered that someone has been spying on them. They suspected Gabriel of working for someone else and being responsible of Dale's disappearance. Gabriel just broke up in tears admitting his guilt. But not for betraying the group but for a darker secret.
